Author: -Macaronis-
Text: Yeah, same. Saturdays and Sundays are the worst. I usually eat home baked cookies or cakes with lots of chocolate. I don't know how to stop. It's like I lose all my willpower on the weekends. The good thing is I'm underweight and am still underweight when I step on a scale after a few days of binging.

Author: mystic-dweller
Text: I just binged Friday and yesterday too looooool.  I would like to get to a point where I have one cheat MEAL on Friday and that's it. I struggle badly with sweets, so at the very least I am trying to save healthy, plant based sweet recipes on Pinterest as a compromise. I figure the least I can do is choose the healthiest versions of my cravings.
